oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Report on the microbial changes in manure and inside larvae during composting
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nordentoft, Steen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Daily samples from manure and larvae have been collected during composting. The microbial community in the samples have been investigated by pyro sequencing of V3-V4 of the 16 rRNA genes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nordentoft, Steen (2014) Report on the microbial changes in manure and inside larvae during composting. National food institute, DTU .
